hero.description: An educational platform that includes everything you need to succeed in your academic path
hero.contentDescription: Over 1000+ course and unit study by trusted and qualified teachers for you

questions.question: What is an FAQ generator?
questions.answer: An FAQ generator is a tool that creates a list of frequently asked questions and answers from the content of your blog article, product documentation, or website.

questions.question: Where can I edit my billing and shipping address?
questions.answer: If you created a new account after or while ordering you can edit both addresses (for billing and shipping) in your customer account.

questions.question: Can I order a free sample copy of a magazine?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, weâ€™re unable to offer free samples. As a retailer, we buy all magazines from their publishers at the regular trade price. However, you could contact the publisher directly.

questions.question: Are unsold magazines sent back to the publisher?
questions.answer: We usually sell all copies of the magazines offered in our shop. Some publishers and distributors offer the retailer the option of returning any unsold magazines. However, because our range includes magazines from countries such as Australia, the USA and the United Kingdom, sending them back would involve considerable effort in terms of logistics and would also be very expensive. We therefore choose not to return any unsold magazines. At the same time, this allows us to also offer our customers older or out-of-print magazines.
